Summary._: Northbound [N][Q] and [R] trains have service changes and delays because of a person struck by a train at 28 St.

Description._: Northbound [N][Q] and [R] trains have service changes and delays because of a person struck by a train at 28 St.

LongDescription:
Northbound [N][Q] trains are running express from Canal St to 57 St-7 Av. 
Some northbound [R] trains are stopping along the [D] line from DeKalb Av to West 4 St-Washington Square, then over the [M] line to 36 St(Queens). 
These service change are because of a person struck by a train at 28 St. 
Expect delays in [D][E][F][N][Q][R] train service.
